  0.0.0.0/0 10.89.202.1
 !
!

ssh timeout 120
ssh server rate-limit 600
ssh server session-limit 110
ssh server v2
ssh server vrf default
ssh server netconf vrf default
crypto ca trustpoint SLA-TrustPoint
!
end
